properties.body:
EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
STRAIT OF SICILY.
VESSEL, SEVEN PERSONS ON BOARD, ADRIFT BETWEEN
TUNISIA AND PANTELLERIA ISLAND (36-50N 011-57E).
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
INMARSAT-C: 424744220, PHONE: 39 065 908 4527,
39 065 908 4409, FAX: 390 6592 2737,
E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
